article_text: Developers eager to snap up waterfront property are swarming to the Miami River, bringing high-rise condos — including one by star architect Rafael Viñoly — and upscale restaurants to a historically industrial area.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Miami, real estate, development, Miami River, River Landing
article_metadata.description: Developers eager to snap up waterfront property are swarming to the Miami River, bringing high-rise condos — including one by star architect Rafael Viñoly — and upscale restaurants to a historically industrial area.
article_metadata.title: As waterfront land dries up, developers rush to Miami River | Miami Herald
